title: Constant Multiplies
text: Use the properties of constant multiples so you can rewrite the problem.

title: Constant Multiplies
text: Using the constant multiples properties of indefinite integrals, /int{4/(1+x**2} can be rewritten as $$___$$?

title: Tangent
text: Use the fact that $${tan}^{\left(-1\right)} x$$ is an antiderivative of $$\frac{1}{1+x^2}$$.
